Articles.Content: Extensive Engineer Report extends the Engineers’ Report in the Vehicle Assembly Building and the Spaceplane Hanger with additional checks to ensure that your vessel has everything you need.. The mod will check if you can transmit any science instruments you have with you, if it lacks radiators, if your spaceplanes have control surfaces and a few more things. More information and the download in the [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/126662](**Forum Thread**

> 
> 
> 
> 
> > [http://i.imgur.com/6A1FTKA.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/6A1FTKA.jpg)
> 

Instructions unclear. Smashed roof of house trying to fit plane into closet.
hehe.. space plane hanger, good one
Wow, i think i'm hungry, that was waaay too funny ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Best way to mock a typo.

LOL.

Now build a closet for it:P
but..but...but why isn't the engineer's report already checking for antennas, radiators and control surfaces ?

> 
> 
> 
> 
> > [http://i.imgur.com/6A1FTKA.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/6A1FTKA.jpg)
> 

For the sake of kerbalkind, don't let Valentina get a hold of the hanger!

Too much?

You know, if the report ever displayed a green icon and said "OK", instead of presenting a yellow icon at best and saying "Nothing of concern", I might actually pay *the slightest* attention to it. But as it is, looking like a constant warning you just ignore at compile time, I don't even.

And given no-one replied on topic, I think most people also don't, even when it's an extensive version ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

>

You just had to do it didn't you.
Thanks Squad! It took me a while to see this because I'm more active on reddit, but I really appreciate the shoutout!
